Bash(cd "F:/Growleads/New folder" && python -c "
import requests, json

TOKEN = 'eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..VJEUIP-pF3pNFWLzQg7vU5wKTXIqBBI-8EbgZ6G6dbY'
API_URL = 'https://apis.event-copilot.ai/app/v1.0/ODgzNDM1/ai/ask/0'

def query\(name\):
    files = {
        'isAudio': \(None, '0'\),
        'question': \(None, f'who were representatives of {name}'\),
        'history': \(None, '[]'\),
    }
    headers = {
        'Authorization': f'Bearer {TOKEN}',
        'Accept': 'text/event-stream',
        'Origin': 'https://aiimpactexpo.event-copilot.ai',
        'Referer': 'https://aiimpactexpo.event-copilot.ai/',
    }
    resp = requests.post\(API_URL, headers=headers, files=files, timeout=90, stream=True\)
    accumulated = ''
    for line in resp.iter_lines\(decode_unicode=True\):
        if not line: continue
        if line.startswith\('d:'\): accumulated += line[2:]
        elif line.startswith\('z:'\): break
    parsed = json.loads\(accumulated\)
    return parsed.get\('entity_summary', 'N/A'\)

tests = ['Ministry of Education', 'Ministry of Ayush', 'IIT Gandhinagar']
import time
for t in tests:
    print\(f'=== {t} ==='\)
    result = query\(t\)
    print\(result[:300]\)
    print\(\)
    time.sleep\(1\)
" 2>&1)
